@SumAussieCobber: toytoyy is absolutely right. 700MB can be burned to a CD whereas 800 (or even 705) cannot. Yet, there is no appreciable quality improvement by making it 800 instead of 700. Yes, 1.4GB will give slightly better quality, but still barely worth it. Thus for any regular length movie, 700MB is the target.
